content: the garden walk shawl karlie paige information needles 3 5 mm / us 4 cirular needles size with at least a 80 cm / 32 cable one size the sample has the following gauge measurements after blocking length 53 cm / 21 29 sts in pattern = 10 cm / 4 width 146 cm / 57 26 row in pattern = 10 cm / 4 *note the sample was stretched length- *achieving gauge is not necessary for this project wise during blocking to achieve a longer different yarn weights and needle sizes can be used length which will result in larger or smaller shawls yarn abbreviations the sample is knit in queensland co cast on collection eco twist k knit 45% viscose 35% cotton 20% linen p purl 100g 250 m / 273 yds pg page colourway #2 earth song pm place marker repeat repeat for the shawl with the measurements rs right side above and with the suggested needle sm slip marker to the other needle size i used 182 g 454 m / 496 yds of st s stitch es yarn ws wrong side yo yarn over *-* repeat the instructions between materials the asterisk tapestry needle stitch markers charts scissors the shawl is worked flat so the charts are read back and forth from right to left for the rs row and from left to right for the ws row starting from the bottom at row 1 the garden walk shawl 01 intended for personal use only do not sell copy or distribute copyright 2025 karlie paige fibre co instructions garter tab co 2 sts and work 8 row in garter stitch knit all the sts do not turn your work after completing row 8 rotate your work 90 degrees and pick up and knit 5 sts along the left garter edge then pick up and knit 2 sts on the cast on edge you now have 9 sts on your needle garter tab cast on tutorial shawl set up row k2 pm yo p2 pm p1 pm p2 yo pm k2 you now have 11 sts on your needles work row 1-29 on chart 1 pg 3 work row 1-15 on border chart 1 pg 5 work row 1-31 on chart 2 pg 4 work row 1-15 on border chart 2 pg 5 return to chart 1 pg 3 and work row 11-29 and then work row 14-25 work row 1-14 of the border chart 1 pg 5 once more on row 15 bind off all sts weave in ends block and enjoy the garden walk shawl 02 intended for personal use only do not sell copy or distribute copyright 2025 karlie paige fibre co chart 1 the garden walk shawl 03 intended for personal use only do not sell copy or distribute copyright 2025 karlie paige fibre co chart 2 the garden walk shawl 04 intended for personal use only do not sell copy or distribute copyright 2025 karlie paige fibre co border chart 1
